name: SitPerfect
tagline: Improve sitting posture by detecting harmful postures using a Kinect sensor (A Sunday afternoon project)
body:
### Welcome to SitPerfect

All you need to improve your sitting posture is a Windows PC and a Kinect.

In the first version a [dangerous music](https://soundcloud.com/jan-mechtel/jaws-x3) starts playing when then angle between your shoulders and your head is less than 50Â°.

This is by no means scientific (yet).

If you want to help and have some fun: jmechtel@gmail.com
